releaseNotes:
Welcome to the new island, EMOTIVERSE, in Applaydu Season 5!

NEW EMOTIVERSE Island
Your kids can learn about emotions, explore feelings and learn how to express themselves through emotional development activities on the EMOTIVERSE island!

New LET’S STORY! Island
Your kids can create their own tales, read, listen to stories and enjoy inspiring mini-games!

More new heroes come to life with a dedicated playing & learning experience.
Welcome baby animals, dragons and veterinary characters to Applaydu!
description:
**Unlock a new world of learning in Applaydu season 5**
Applaydu by Kinder is a safe learning world for your kids, filled with various themed islands to grow through playing. Your kids can learn about math and letters, and unleash their imagination by creating stories on the new LET’S STORY! island. They can also learn about feelings and emotions with the new EMOTIVERSE island, help injured animals with veterinary games, and care for the planet in NATOONS.
Watch your kids create stories with LET’S STORY!, express feelings with EMOTIVERSE, explore diverse learning themes and engage in AR experiences. Applaydu by Kinder is 100% kid-safe, ad-free, and ensures high-quality screen time under parents' supervision.

**Create kids own adventure in LET’S STORY! Island**
Applaydu by Kinder welcomes LET’S STORY!, a new island where your kids can create their own tales and engage in stories. In LET’S STORY!, children can choose characters, destinations, and plots and create stories from images to audio. Parents and kids can listen to stories together and enjoy mini-games to inspire young minds.

**Develop emotion learning with EMOTIVERSE Island**
Time for emotional intelligence with EMOTIVERSE in Applaydu by Kinder. Your kids can explore different emotions in EMOTIVERSE, and recognize and express their feelings. EMOTIVERSE also helps kids understand others’ feelings through emotion-learning activities. Engaging in educational games while learning about emotions in EMOTIVERSE will make the feelings’ journey enjoyable.

**Discover wild animals in NATOONS and learn how to care for them**
Let’s welcome the baby animals to NATOONS! Children can explore wild animals, learn about how baby animals are born, how they sound and what their habitats are. Your kids can foster a connection with nature through activities like saving animals and picking up trash. 
Kids can step into the role of future vets, learning to heal animals. Let your children immerse themselves in the educational world of Applaydu NATOONS, where inspiring stories and learning games await!

**Unleash creativity with the Avatar House**
Your kids can create their dream house with avatar customization. They can express their feelings and unique style by decorating a custom bedroom with furniture, drawing floors and wallpaper. Tons of possible creations await in the Avatar House.

**Multiple learning games to grow skills**
Step into Applaydu by Kinder with inspiring educational games & stories. Various game types, from logic puzzles, racing, stories, AR activities, feelings & emotions exploration on EMOTIVERSE to animal petting, offer an immersive learning experience. Your kids can create with drawings, coloring, and playing with dinosaurs, or engage in educational games with math, numbers and letters.

**Teleport to a world of AR Joy and Movement!**
Now parents and kids can enjoy AR JOY OF MOVING games! Backed by science, these fun-filled games keep kids active & learning through the proven JOY OF MOVING Methodology—helping them grow, move, and thrive while having a blast at home! Your kids can also use the 3D scan to teleport their favorite characters to the Applaydu by Kinder AR world, to play and even talk to them.

**Monitor your child's learning progress**
Applaydu's parent area ensures a safe and educational environment for your kids. The feature allows you to monitor your children's progress with personalized recommendations. Applaydu by Kinder is 100% kid-safe, playable offline, ad-free, has no in-app purchases, and supports 18 languages.
______________
Applaydu, an Official Kinder App, is certified by the kidSAFE Seal Program (www.kidsafeseal.com) and EducationalAppStore.com.
Contact us at contact@applaydu.com
For privacy-related questions, please write to privacy@ferrero.com or go to http://applaydu.kinder.com/legal
To find instructions to delete your account, please visit: 
https://applaydu.kinder.com/static/public/docs/web/en/pp/pp-0.0.1.html
